Package pl.kmolski.hydrohomie.coaster.controller

Class UserCoasterController

java.lang.Object
pl.kmolski.hydrohomie.coaster.controller.UserCoasterController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/user") public class UserCoasterController extends Object
User-accessible controller providing coaster presentation and management.

      model - the template model
      updateCoasterDetailsDto - new DTO for the coaster details

    • editCoasterAction

      @PostMapping("/editCoaster/{id}") public reactor.core.publisher.Mono<String> editCoasterAction(@PathVariable("id") String deviceName, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth, org.springframework.ui.Model model, @Valid @Valid UpdateCoasterDetailsDto updateCoasterDto, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
      Update the coaster details to the ones specified in the edit coaster form.
      Parameters:
      deviceName - the name of the coaster to update
      auth - the user's authentication object
      model - the template model
      updateCoasterDto - DTO for the password change
      result - the result of DTO binding (includes validation errors)
      Returns:
      the success page or form with errors

    • getMeasurements

      @ResponseBody @GetMapping(path="/coaster/{id}/measurements", produces="application/json") public reactor.core.publisher.Flux<Measurement> getMeasurements(@PathVariable("id") String deviceName, @RequestParam("start") Long start, @RequestParam("end") Long end, @RequestParam("unit") ChronoUnit unit, @RequestParam("tz") ZoneId tz, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Fetch measurements for the given coaster in the specified time period and timezone, grouped by the time unit.
      Parameters:
      deviceName - the name of the coaster
      start - the period start time
      end - the period end time
      unit - the time unit to group by
      tz - the period time zone
      authentication - the user's authentication object
      Returns:
      the list of measurements

    • getLatestMeasurements

      @ResponseBody @GetMapping(path="/coaster/{id}/latestMeasurements", produces="application/json") public reactor.core.publisher.Flux<Measurement> getLatestMeasurements(@PathVariable("id") String deviceName, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)
      Fetch the last 10 measurements for the given coaster.
      Parameters:
      deviceName - the name of the coaster
      authentication - the user's authentication object
      Returns:
      the list of measurements
